learning_objective: Create programs that include sequences, events, loops, and conditionals.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is beginning a new weightlifting routine. They plan to start by lifting 10 pounds and will increase the weight they lift by 5 pounds each week. They've set a goal to eventually lift 75 pounds. In which week will Alex reach their weightlifting goal?",
    "Answer1": "Week 14",
    "Answer2": "Week 7",
    "Answer3": "Week 10",
    "Answer4": "Week 13",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "This is a simple looping problem. Starting at 10 pounds, Alex will add 5 pounds per week. So, 10 (for week 1) + 5*13 (for the next 13 weeks) = 75 pounds, which Alex will reach during the 14th week."
}
